p.k: Quinton is on the run from some very bad people; he’s stolen a bag of money, has his hands bound together, and has no idea where he is! Quinton runs until he finds a house to hide behind. Amazing Evelyn is in her backyard, relaxing, when Quinton shows up and hides behind her house. This might seem scary but it’s actually perfect timing… devious Evelyn was just getting bored and she could use something to spice up her afternoon!
